author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

The goal of this PR is improve the configuration for the Tracker Alignment PV Validation tool. It consist or 3 commits:
   * 96b1495 adds a `fillDescription` method to the `PrimaryVertexValidation` module.
   * 0405652  massively reduces the amount of boilerplate configuration code for vertex clustering in `PrimaryVertexValidation`.
   * https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/commit/d1a1621791e998feb77829d379ec438c48c2a8eb  reverts changes to the `maxD0Error` and `maxDzerror` parameters to be consistent with situation prior to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/commit/c8462ae4313b6be3bbce36e45373aa6e87253c59.

#### PR validation:

Private validation shows no regressions. Basic integration tests (subsytem unit tests) passed

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

This PR is not a backport, but it will be backported to 11.1.X.
title: [Tracker Alignment] Improve PV Validation configurations
